001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.qualifyingEvent;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.PumpStateSupplier;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.ControlIQInfoRequestBuilder;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.CurrentBatteryRequestBuilder;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.IOBRequestBuilder;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders.LastBolusStatusRequestBuilder;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlertStatusRequest;
012import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.BasalIQSettingsRequest;
013import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.BasalIQStatusRequest;
014import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.BolusPermissionChangeReasonRequest;
015import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.CGMAlertStatusRequest;
016import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.CGMStatusRequest;
017import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.ControlIQSleepScheduleRequest;
018import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.CurrentBasalStatusRequest;
019import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.CurrentBolusStatusRequest;
020import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.CurrentEGVGuiDataRequest;
021import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.ExtendedBolusStatusRequest;
022import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.HomeScreenMirrorRequest;
023import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.InsulinStatusRequest;
024import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.LastBGRequest;
025import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.MalfunctionStatusRequest;
026import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.ProfileStatusRequest;
027import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.ReminderStatusRequest;
028import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.TempRateRequest;
029import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.TimeSinceResetRequest;
030
031import org.json.JSONObject;
032
033import java.util.HashSet;
034import java.util.Set;
035import java.util.TreeSet;
036import java.util.function.Supplier;
037import java.util.stream.Collectors;
038
039/**
040 * A list of all QualifyingEvents which can be sent from the pump. For some events, a set of request
041 * messages which can be sent (via `sendPumpCommand`) to receive more information about the event
042 * which just occurred, in logic matching the Tandem mobile app, is included. To get these
043 * instantiated request messages, you can invoke:
044 *     QualifyingEvent.groupSuggestedHandlers(qualifyingEvents)
045 *
046 * Note that if t:connect app connection sharing is enabled and the t:connect app is running,
047 * you can use enableSendSharedConnectionResponseMessages and get the response from these callbacks
048 * for free, without duplicating requests.
049 */
050public enum QualifyingEvent {
051    ALERT(1, Set.of(
052            AlertStatusRequest::new)),
053    ALARM(2, Set.of(
054            AlarmStatusRequest::new)),
055    REMINDER(4, Set.of(
056            ReminderStatusRequest::new)),
057    MALFUNCTION(8, Set.of(
058            MalfunctionStatusRequest::new)),
059    CGM_ALERT(16, Set.of(
060            CGMAlertStatusRequest::new)),
061    HOME_SCREEN_CHANGE(32, Set.of(
062            CurrentBasalStatusRequest::new,
063            CurrentEGVGuiDataRequest::new,
064            HomeScreenMirrorRequest::new,
065            () -> ControlIQInfoRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.pumpApiVersion.get()))),
066    PUMP_SUSPEND(64, Set.of(
067            InsulinStatusRequest::new,
068            () -> IOBRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.controlIQSupported.get()))),
069    PUMP_RESUME(128, Set.of(
070            InsulinStatusRequest::new,
071            () -> IOBRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.controlIQSupported.get()),
072            CurrentEGVGuiDataRequest::new,
073            ProfileStatusRequest::new)),
074    TIME_CHANGE(256, Set.of(
075            () -> IOBRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.controlIQSupported.get()),
076            CGMStatusRequest::new,
077            TimeSinceResetRequest::new)),
078    BASAL_CHANGE(512, Set.of(
079            () -> IOBRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.controlIQSupported.get()),
080            HomeScreenMirrorRequest::new,
081            CurrentBasalStatusRequest::new,
082            TempRateRequest::new)),
083    BOLUS_CHANGE(1024, Set.of(
084            CurrentBolusStatusRequest::new,
085            ExtendedBolusStatusRequest::new,
086            () -> LastBolusStatusRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.pumpApiVersion.get()))),
087    IOB_CHANGE(2048, Set.of(
088            () -> IOBRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.controlIQSupported.get()))),
089    EXTENDED_BOLUS_CHANGE(4096, Set.of(
090            ExtendedBolusStatusRequest::new,
091            () -> LastBolusStatusRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.pumpApiVersion.get()))),
092    PROFILE_CHANGE(8192, Set.of(
093            ProfileStatusRequest::new)),
094    BG(16384, Set.of(
095            LastBGRequest::new)),
096    CGM_CHANGE(32768, Set.of(
097            CGMStatusRequest::new,
098            CurrentEGVGuiDataRequest::new,
099            HomeScreenMirrorRequest::new)),
100    BATTERY(65536, Set.of(
101            () -> CurrentBatteryRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.pumpApiVersion.get()))),
102    BASAL_IQ(131072, Set.of(
103            BasalIQSettingsRequest::new)),
104    REMAINING_INSULIN(262144, Set.of(
105            InsulinStatusRequest::new)),
106    SUSPEND_COMM(524288),
107    ACTIVE_SEGMENT_CHANGE(1048576, Set.of(
108            ProfileStatusRequest::new)),
109    BASAL_IQ_STATUS(2097152, Set.of(
110            BasalIQSettingsRequest::new,
111            BasalIQStatusRequest::new)),
112    CONTROL_IQ_INFO(4194304, Set.of(
113            () -> IOBRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.controlIQSupported.get()),
114            () -> ControlIQInfoRequestBuilder.create(PumpStateSupplier.pumpApiVersion.get()),
115            ControlIQSleepScheduleRequest::new)),
116    CONTROL_IQ_SLEEP(8388608, Set.of(
117            ControlIQSleepScheduleRequest::new)),
118    BOLUS_PERMISSION_REVOKED(2147483648L, Set.of(
119            () -> {
120                if (PumpStateSupplier.inProgressBolusId != null && PumpStateSupplier.inProgressBolusId.get() != null) {
121                    return new BolusPermissionChangeReasonRequest(PumpStateSupplier.inProgressBolusId.get());
122                }
123                return null;
124            }
125    )),
126
127    ;
128    private final long id;
129    private final Set<Supplier<? extends Message>> suggestedHandlers;
130    QualifyingEvent(long id) {
131        this.id = id;
132        this.suggestedHandlers = new HashSet<>();
133    }
134
135    QualifyingEvent(long id, Set<Supplier<? extends Message>> suggestedHandlers) {
136        this.id = id;
137        this.suggestedHandlers = suggestedHandlers;
138    }
139
140    public final long getId() {
141        return id;
142    }
143
144    public final Set<Supplier<? extends Message>> getSuggestedHandlers() {
145        return suggestedHandlers;
146    }
147
148    public static Set<QualifyingEvent> fromBitmask(long bitmask) {
149        Set<QualifyingEvent> ret = new TreeSet<>();
150        for (QualifyingEvent e : values()) {
151            if ((bitmask & e.getId()) != 0) {
152                ret.add(e);
153            }
154        }
155        return ret;
156    }
157
158    public static Set<QualifyingEvent> fromRawBtBytes(byte[] raw) {
159        return fromBitmask(Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0));
160    }
161
162    public static Set<? extends Message> groupSuggestedHandlers(Set<QualifyingEvent> events) {
163        Set<Supplier<? extends Message>> messages = new HashSet<>();
164        for (QualifyingEvent e : events) {
165            messages.addAll(e.suggestedHandlers);
166        }
167        return messages.stream().map(Supplier::get).collect(Collectors.toSet());
168    }
169
170    public static int toBitmask(QualifyingEvent...states) {
171        int bitmask = 0;
172        for (QualifyingEvent e : states) {
173            bitmask |= e.getId();
174        }
175        return bitmask;
176    }
177
178    public String jsonToString() {
179        JSONObject obj = new JSONObject();
180        obj.put("event", name());
181        return obj.toString(0);
182    }
183
184    public JSONObject asJsonObject() {
185        JSONObject obj = new JSONObject();
186        obj.put("event", name());
187        return obj;
188    }
189
190}
